home.description: Discover the beauty of nature and the excitement of our trails.

ten_km_trail.description: Explore the short trail through scenic landscapes.

mountain_trail.title: Mountain Trail
mountain_trail.description: Experience the breathtaking views and serene atmosphere of the Rostushe mountain trail.

rules.title: Rules and Regulations
rules.point1: All participants must register before the event.
rules.point2: Follow the designated trail markers at all times.
rules.point3: Respect the environment and fellow participants.

home.village_description: Rostushe is a picturesque village located in the heart of nature, surrounded by mountains and lush greenery. It offers a perfect escape for those seeking tranquility and adventure. The village is known for its rich cultural heritage and warm hospitality, making it an ideal destination for tourists and nature enthusiasts.

about-us.rostushe_description: Rostushe is a village in Western Macedonia, located near the Radika River, which is known for its beauty and natural resources. The village is situated in a mountainous region, making it a pleasant place for nature lovers and hikers. Rostushe is known for its traditional architecture, hospitality, and still-preserved ancient customs and culture. Most of the village’s residents have moved to Western European countries (Italy, Germany, Switzerland, etc.), but during the summer and winter periods, they return to their homeland. Tourism is developing in this region thanks to its natural beauty and opportunities for active tourism, such as hiking and visiting historical and cultural sites. Below are some of the natural and cultural landmarks in Rostushe:
about-us.association_description: The sports association ‘Everesting Rostushe’ is an organization formed by citizens passionate about sports. It was established by a group of adult individuals who share a love for sports, with the goal of engaging in organized sports activities and competitions at all levels—municipal, national, and international. This association consists of adult members from the village of Rostushe and other sports enthusiasts who work towards achieving goals and objectives in the field of sports and physical activities. The headquarters of EVERSTING ROSTUSHE is located in the village of Rostushe, Municipality of Mavrovo and Rostushe.

team.haris_achievment1: More than 10 years of active mountaineering experience, 5 years of participation in races in our country and international races
team.haris_achievment2: First in our country to have organized an Everesting event, second in the Balkans, 613th in the world

overview.title: Bagrem Trail 10K / 520 D+
overview.description: Beginners and runners who enjoy dynamic and vivid sections will love our shortest trail — Bagrem Trail 10K. Starting from Rostushe village, it follows the Radika River, passes through authentic rural landscapes to Janche (checkpoint), then loops back via Adzievci to the finish in Rostushe.

starter_pack.title: Starter Pack
items: Awards for top male and female finishers

audience.title: Who is it for?
audience.description: Bagrem Trail is ideal for recreational runners, families, and friends of participants in longer races who also want a taste of the mountain running experience.

route.title: Route & GPX File
route.description: Download the GPX file and preview the route to prepare for your trail run.

overview.title: Krchin Trail 24K / 1600 D+
overview.description: One peak. One mission. No excuses. Krchin Trail 24K is for true mountain lovers seeking serious challenges. Starting from Rostushe in the Mavrovo National Park, it climbs through alpine forests and rocky terrain toward the striking Krchin ridgeline.

starter_pack.title: Starter Pack
items: Awards for top male and female runners

audience.title: Why choose Krchin Trail?
reasons: Run along some of the highest alpine ridgelines in the region
Pass by a hidden glacial lake — Lokuv
Challenging technical terrain — true mountain running
Experience authentic nature in Mavrovo National Park

route.title: Route & GPX
route.description: Download the official route file and preview the landscape.

overview.title: Trail Guide
overview.description: Explore the key features of both Krchin Trail 24K and Bagrem Trail 10K. Whether you seek a technical alpine challenge or a scenic beginner route, we have you covered.

krchin.title: Krchin Trail 24K
krchin.description: A challenging race for true mountain lovers. Starting in Rostushe, climbing through alpine forests to the rocky ridges and peak Golem Krchin (2341m), this route offers technical terrain, fast descents, and a view of Lokuv glacier lake.

bagrem.title: Bagrem Trail 10K
bagrem.description: Ideal for beginners and recreational runners. It follows the Radika River, passes through Janche and Adjievci, and returns to Rostushe, offering stunning views and cultural immersion.

api.age_restriction: Runner is not eligible for this trail. Read Rules and Regulations section.
